org.numenta.nupic.network

Class Layer.FunctionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.network.Layer.FunctionFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    Layer<T>

    class Layer.FunctionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory which returns an Observable capable of transforming known input formats to the universal format object passed between all Observables in the Observable chains making up the processing steps involving HTM algorithms. The Transformer implementations are used to transform various inputs into a ManualInput, and thus are used at the beginning of any Observable chain; each succeding Observable in a given chain would then communicate via passed ManualInputs or Inferences (which are the same thing).
    Author:
    David Ray
    See Also:
    Layer.completeDispatch(Object), Layer.resolveObservableSequence(Object), Layer#fillInSequence(Observable)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Layer.FunctionFactory.Copy2Inference
      Emits an Observable which copies an Inference input to the output, storing relevant information in this layer's inference object along the way.
      (package private) class  Layer.FunctionFactory.Map2Inference
      Emits an Observable which is transformed from a Map input type to one that emits Inferences.
      (package private) class  Layer.FunctionFactory.String2Inference
      WARNING: UNIMPLEMENTED
      (package private) class  Layer.FunctionFactory.Vector2Inference
      Emits an Observable which is transformed from a binary vector input type to one that emits Inferences.
